akn:section.akn:heading: Penalties for offenses committed during release.

akn:content.akn:p: Any person convicted of an offense committed while released pursuant to section 23-1321 shall be subject to the following penalties in addition to any other applicable penalties:
The giving of a warning to the person when released of the penalties imposed by this section shall not be a prerequisite to the application of this section.
Any term of imprisonment imposed pursuant to this section shall be consecutive to any other sentence of imprisonment.
In addition to any other penalty provided under this section, a person may be fined an amount not more than the amount set forth in ยง 22-3571.01.
